title: How to Find Secrets in Ultimate Custom Night in Five Nights at Freddy's

steps.title: Set Golden Freddy to 1 difficulty.
steps.content: Set Golden Freddy to 1 difficulty. Disable all of the animatronics, if they were enabled, and set Golden Freddy's difficulty to "1".

steps.title: Collect 10 Faz-Coins.
steps.content: Collect 10 Faz-Coins. You can do so by searching around the cameras, or by interacting with Rockstar Foxy.

steps.title: Buy the Death Coin.
steps.content: Buy the Death Coin. Switch the camera to CAM 07 and buy the Death Coin on the prize corner. After you buy the Death Coin, you will notice that there seems to be an unknown top hat on the desk which has not been ever seen during any time of the night.

steps.title: Wait for Golden Freddy to appear.
steps.content: Wait for Golden Freddy to appear. Keep lifting your monitor up and down until Golden Freddy appears.

steps.title: Click the Death Coin icon quickly.
steps.content: Click the Death Coin icon quickly. The icon is located at the top left corner of the screen. Click it while Golden Freddy appears in the office and you will immediately receive a spooky jumpscare by Fredbear. After the Game Over screen shows up, you will hear some distorted noises. These voices have been decoded later on. The voices are saying: "Let's find a suit that's right for you," and "There was more fantasy and fun where I came from." [1] X Research source

steps.title: Set Old Man Consequences difficulty to 1.
steps.content: Set Old Man Consequences difficulty to 1. Again, disable all the other animatronics and hit "GO!".

steps.title: Simply wait for him.
steps.content: Simply wait for him. Just wait until his 8-bit mini-game appears.

steps.title: Catch the fish.
steps.content: Catch the fish. Press C at the right moment to complete his mini-game. This is a reference to the Old Man Consequences Ending in FNAF World. You will go the exact same place by following the correct steps in the mini game. If you speed up the background music, you can hear someone screaming for help and calling the name Mike.

steps.title: Talk to Old Man Consequences.
steps.content: Talk to Old Man Consequences. He will say to the player, "Come and sit with me a while," and "Leave the demon to his demons. Rest your own soul. There is nothing else." [2] X Research source

steps.title: Drown yourself into the lake.
steps.content: Drown yourself into the lake. Stay at the upper side of the lake and keep pressing A + D to dive into the water. Finally, your game crashes.

steps.title: Boot up FNAF World to see something special.
steps.content: Boot up FNAF World to see something special. You will notice that your game has already unlocked an ending even if you haven't entered the game yet.

steps.title: Test your luck.
steps.content: Test your luck. The creepy child image will only appear randomly after you get jumpscared or you put your monitor back down. This has been theorized that he is a spirit of The One You Should Not Have Killed who keeps being mentioned by other animatronics.

steps.title: Wait until the first secret character, XOR (a.k.a.
steps.content: Wait until the first secret character, XOR (a.k.a. Shadow DD) appears. She will spawn 2-6 secret characters in your night.

steps.title: Spawn RXQ (a.k.a.
steps.content: Spawn RXQ (a.k.a. Shadow Bonnie). Lift your monitor up and down and the second secret character, Shadow Bonnie, will appear and turn your office background to pitch black.

steps.title: Get rid of Plushtrap.
steps.content: Get rid of Plushtrap. He is the third secret character and will appear beside Funtime Foxy's Cove. Keep staring at him until he goes away.

steps.title: Deal with other secret characters.
steps.content: Deal with other secret characters. Nightmare Chica, Lolbit, Bonnet, and Minireena will be spawned later on. Activate the Power A/C to get rid of Nightmare Chica's teeth around the screen. Type L-O-L if Lolbit's icon appears. Click Bonnet's nose before she walks away. Minireena will only appear and block your sight. Minireena won't do any harm if you don't do anything, so wait for 45 seconds and they will disappear.

steps.title: Test your luck.
steps.content: Test your luck. Random secret characters may get spawned every now and then, after you get killed by an animatronic.
